byline.contributor: Adam Wu and Karoline Kan contributed research.

lead_paragraph: The country’s flood defenses have faltered in the past, but Prime Minister Li Keqiang has said that the government is better prepared this year.

headline.print_headline: Widespread Flooding in China Kills Scores and Tests Leaders
headline.main: Widespread Flooding in China Kills Over 160, Providing a Test for Leaders

snippet: The country’s flood defenses have faltered in the past, but Prime Minister Li Keqiang has said that the government is better prepared this year....
abstract: Torrential rains and consequent flooding have led to deaths of over 160 citizens in southern China and tested ability of leadership to deliver on promises of safety.
